amendment.description: Amendment extends the regulatory rulemaking moratorium for businesses with fewer than 100 employees for an additional six month period beyond the term provided in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to extend the regulatory rulemaking moratorium for businesses with fewer than 100 employees for an additional six month period beyond the term provided in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tate amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 370 - 45, 1 Present (Roll no. 167).
